name: Color Picker
description: Color Picker is a component for specifying a color.

properties.name: pickerTriggerVisibility
properties.label: Picker Trigger Visibility
properties.settingTooltip: When this parameter is set to true, the Color Picker will be loaded on the page in the collapsed form. Otherwise, once the page is loaded the component's interface will be hidden.

properties.name: circleColorPicker
properties.label: Circle Color Picker
properties.settingTooltip: Enables the wheel layout for the Color Picker.

properties.name: verticalColorPicker
properties.label: Vertical Color Picker
properties.settingTooltip: When set to false, the component is loaded horizontally, otherwise vertically.

properties.name: opacitySliderVisibility
properties.label: Opacity Slider Visibility
properties.settingTooltip: Enables the opacity slider in the color picker menu.

properties.name: opacityInputVisibility
properties.label: Opacity Input Visibility
properties.settingTooltip: Enables the opacity input in the color picker menu.

properties.name: rgbFormatVisibility
properties.label: RGB Format Visibility
properties.settingTooltip: Enables the RGB color input fields in the Color Picker menu.

properties.name: hslFormatVisibility
properties.label: HSL Format Visibility
properties.settingTooltip: Enables the HSL color input fields in the Color Picker menu.

properties.name: selectedColor
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine what color should be applied in the color picker.
properties.label: Selected Color
properties.settingTooltip: Controls the default color of the Color Picker.

eventHandlers.name: onChangeColor
eventHandlers.label: On Change Color Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the user changes the picker selected color.
